QuizPET authoring tool provides interface to create and mofidy [[Smart Content|parameterized semantics problems]], organize such problems into topics, and index such problems with underlying concepts.\nQuizPET authoring is developed under the same architecture as [[QuizJET Authoring System]]. Please find details there.
